publication.title: Evaluating Ocular Response in the Retina and Optic Nerve Head after Single and Fractionated High-Energy Protons

treatments.dose: 0.5 Gy or 12 equal dose fractions for a total dose of 0.5 Gy over twenty-five days

results.effect: increased number of apoptotic cells in the retina and ONH
enhanced immunoreactivity for oxidative biomarker, 4-hydroxynonenal (4-HNE) in the retina and ONH
results.magnitude: more pronounced changes observed with a single dose of 0.5 Gy

results.effect: significant increase in AQP-4 expression in the retina, PECAM-1 and ZO-1 expression changes in the retina
results.magnitude: changes in BRB biomarker distribution between the retina and ONH
